title: LUXURY CORNER UNIT, WATER VIEWS, INCLUDES HEAT/HOT WATER 1 GARAGE PKG
posting_body: ['Rarely available, corner unit, this beautiful 2 bedroom, 2 bath condo', 'with oversized living room with dining area has stainless appliances,', 'high end gas stove, custom cabinets and central air.', 'Amenities include, swimming pool, fitness center, tennis, basketball,', 'sauna, steam, yoga, etc.', '24 hour security, walk to Longwood Medical, D line, shops,', 'restaurants, etc.', 'Includes heat/hot water, gas and a direct entry garage parking space.', 'Available for September 1.', 'No pets or smoking.', 'Set up your viewing now.', 'There is a real estate fee of $3,800.', 'if you rent this condo.', 'Monaco R.E.', 'Newton, MA', '617-974-3019', 'Leave me your email address for photos.', 'Please reference: Luxury condo Brookline in your text or message Thank you']
